description.zh-cn: 一种行政区划类型，为自治地方的一种，拥有较所属国家其他同级行政区划为高的自主权。通常设置在国内少数民族的主要居住地、离岛或边境地区。
description.en: A type of administrative division, a form of autonomous area, which has a higher degree of self-rule than other political divisions in the same country. Typically established in areas with significant ethnic minorities, remote islands, or border regions.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国处理国内民族问题的基本政策和基本政治制度，在少数民族聚居地区设立自治机关，行使自治权。
description.en: The fundamental policy and political system of the People's Republic of China for handling domestic ethnic issues, which involves establishing self-governing bodies and exercising autonomy in areas where ethnic minorities live in concentrated communities.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，实行民族区域自治制度。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia that implements the system of regional ethnic autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人，确定了在中国实行民族区域自治的制度。
description.en: A primary founder and leader of the Chinese Communist Party, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army, who established the system of regional ethnic autonomy in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，主管民族工作，起草了《民族区域自治实施纲要》。
description.en: An early leader of the Chinese Communist Party in charge of ethnic affairs, who drafted the 'Implementation Outline for the System of Regional Ethnic Autonomy'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的蒙古族高级将领和政治家，领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定。
description.en: A high-ranking general and statesman of Mongol ethnicity in the People's Republic of China, who led and completed the formulation of the 'Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的藏族高级政治家，领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定。
description.en: A high-ranking Tibetan statesman in the People's Republic of China, who led and completed the formulation of the 'Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，其民族政策从民族自决转向民族区域自治。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, whose ethnic policy shifted from national self-determination to regional ethnic autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于民族区域自治制度的根本法律。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China concerning the system of regional ethnic autonomy.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领
en: Common Program of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的临时宪法，规定了应实行民族区域自治。
description.en: The provisional constitution during the early years of the People's Republic of China, which stipulated that regional ethnic autonomy should be implemented.

nodes.id: 民族区域自治实施纲要

zh-cn: 民族区域自治实施纲要
en: Implementation Outline for the System of Regional Ethnic Autonomy

description.zh-cn: 由李维汉起草的关于实施民族区域自治的文件，其内容被载入1954年宪法。
description.en: A document on the implementation of regional ethnic autonomy drafted by Li Weihan, the contents of which were incorporated into the 1954 Constitution.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
en: 1954 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一部宪法，确认了民族区域自治在国家政治制度体系中的重要地位。
description.en: The first constitution of the People's Republic of China, which affirmed the important status of regional ethnic autonomy in the state's political system.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
en: 1982 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的现行宪法，其颁行加强了民族区域自治制度建设。
description.en: The current constitution of the People's Republic of China, the promulgation of which strengthened the development of the system of regional ethnic autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在处理国内民族问题上的早期方案，后被民族区域自治所取代。
description.en: The early approach of the Chinese Communist Party to handling domestic ethnic issues, later replaced by regional ethnic autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 一个共产党的国际联合组织，中国共产党曾是其下属支部。
description.en: An international organization of communist parties, of which the Chinese Communist Party was a member.

description.zh-cn: 俄国共产主义革命家、政治家和政治理论家，其思想对中国共产党早期民族政策有重要影响。
description.en: A Russian communist revolutionary, politician, and political theorist whose ideas significantly influenced the early ethnic policies of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个省级自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five provincial-level autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个省级自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five provincial-level autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个省级自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five provincial-level autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个省级自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five provincial-level autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个省级自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five provincial-level autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战后成立的国际组织，其决议促成了芬兰奥兰自治区的成立。
description.en: An international organization founded after World War I, whose resolution led to the establishment of the Åland autonomous region in Finland.

description.zh-cn: 芬兰的自治区，为瑞典语人口而成立。
description.en: An autonomous region of Finland, established for its Swedish-speaking population.

description.zh-cn: 北欧国家，其下设有一个自治区奥兰。
description.en: A Nordic country with one autonomous region, Åland.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期贯彻列宁思想来处理国内民族问题。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party implemented Leninist thought in its early handling of domestic ethnic issues.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期接受共产国际的领导。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party accepted the leadership of the Comintern in its early days.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的民族政策从民族自决转向民族区域自治。
description.en: The ethnic policy of the Chinese Communist Party shifted from national self-determination to regional ethnic autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在政策上淡化了民族自决观念，转而提倡民族区域自治。
description.en: The Chinese Communist Party de-emphasized the concept of national self-determination in its policy, promoting regional ethnic autonomy instead.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东咨询李维汉后，确定了在中国建立多民族国家内实行民族区域自治的制度。
description.en: After consulting with Li Weihan, Mao Zedong decided to establish the system of regional ethnic autonomy within a multi-ethnic state in China.

description.zh-cn: 为确定民族区域自治制度，毛泽东曾咨询主管民族工作的李维汉。
description.en: To establish the system of regional ethnic autonomy, Mao Zedong consulted with Li Weihan, who was in charge of ethnic affairs.

relationships.target: 民族区域自治实施纲要

description.zh-cn: 李维汉起草了《民族区域自治实施纲要》。
description.en: Li Weihan drafted the 'Implementation Outline for the System of Regional Ethnic Autonomy'.

relationships.source: 中国人民政治协商会议共同纲领

description.zh-cn: 《共同纲领》规定“各少数民族聚居的地区，应实行民族的区域自治”。
description.en: The 'Common Program' stipulated that 'in areas where ethnic minorities are concentrated, regional autonomy for the ethnic groups shall be implemented'.

relationships.source: 民族区域自治实施纲要
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

description.zh-cn: 《民族区域自治实施纲要》的内容被载入1954年的中华人民共和国宪法。
description.en: The contents of the 'Implementation Outline for the System of Regional Ethnic Autonomy' were incorporated into the 1954 Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫与阿沛·阿旺晋美共同领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定工作。
description.en: Ulanhu, along with Ngapoi Ngawang Jigme, led and completed the work of formulating the 'Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy'.

description.zh-cn: 阿沛·阿旺晋美与乌兰夫共同领导并完成了《民族区域自治法》的制定工作。
description.en: Ngapoi Ngawang Jigme, along with Ulanhu, led and completed the work of formulating the 'Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy'.

description.zh-cn: 《民族区域自治法》的颁行使民族区域自治制度建设进一步得以加强。
description.en: The promulgation of the 'Law on Regional Ethnic Autonomy' further strengthened the development of the system of regional ethnic autonomy.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 1982年宪法的颁行使民族区域自治制度建设进一步得以加强。
description.en: The promulgation of the 1982 Constitution further strengthened the development of the system of regional ethnic autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 奥兰自治区是自1920年起在国际联盟的决议下成立的。
description.en: The autonomous region of Åland was established in 1920 under a resolution of the League of Nations.

description.zh-cn: 新疆维吾尔自治区是中华人民共和国的一个省级行政区。
description.en: The Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region is a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区是中华人民共和国的一个省级行政区。
description.en: The Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region is a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 宁夏回族自治区是中华人民共和国的一个省级行政区。
description.en: The Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region is a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区是中华人民共和国的一个省级行政区。
description.en: The Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region is a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 西藏自治区是中华人民共和国的一个省级行政区。
description.en: The Tibet Autonomous Region is a provincial-level administrative division of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 奥兰是芬兰的一个自治区。
description.en: Åland is an autonomous region of Finland.
